title: Calories in a Dorito
meta_description: Learn calories in a dorito with full nutrition facts including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and serving tips for better tracking.
assumptions: Standard Nacho Cheese flavor, average single chip (~1.5g), fried variety.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, size, and brand; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A single Dorito chip contains about 6 kcal and is high in sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a single Dorito?
faqs.a: Approximately 6 kcal per chip for standard Nacho Cheese.

faqs.q: What is the fat content in a Dorito?
faqs.a: About 0.3 g total fat, including 0.1 g saturated fat per chip.
Yes, around 8 mg sodium per chip, which adds up in larger servings.

faqs.q: How many carbs in one Dorito?
faqs.a: Roughly 0.7 g carbs, with 0.1 g fiber and 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: Does flavor affect calories in a Dorito?
faqs.a: Slightly; most flavors are similar at 5-7 kcal per chip, but check labels.
